tweets.text: Today we let the water through our first completed #FishPassage the RiverSevern 🙌 #LetItFlow #FishPassage @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWalesandSW @CanalRiverTrust @fishmigration @LIFEprogramme @HeritageFundM_E @kiergroup https://t.co/M5LzxjUZNu

Today we let the water through our first completed #FishPassage the RiverSevern 🙌 #LetItFlow #FishPassage @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWalesandSW @CanalRiverTrust @fishmigration @LIFEprogramme @HeritageFundM_E @kiergroup https://t.co/DvPy25LSuh

Good old @EnvAgency does it again. Missed its own performance target by nearly 25%.

Aim for 2019 - 20, "Enhance", 2,300 kilometres of rivers, lakes and coastal waters.

Result? Fail!

Question. What exactly do you mean by "enhanced"? How is that defined, who makes that decision? https://t.co/9x3KDtkqDj

The #FCERMStrategy is now a legally binding document

It informs our future direction to help make millions of homes and businesses more resilient to #Flooding #CoastalErosion and #ClimateChange

@RibbleLife @Feargal_Sharkey @JackPerksPhoto https://t.co/fDjT55IFBv

@BeaverTrust @TonyJuniper @spainshall @DefraGovUK @pow_rebecca @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency Depends how much rain there is, the dams will be maintaining vast quantities of water in the earth, due to slowing the flow & raising the water table. Torrential rain will  = more runoff due to saturated land & if the dams burst then the results will be worse than ever before. 👍

tweets.text:
A compelling and devastating round-up of the calamity facing England's rivers and the "Hotbed of mediocrity", that is the @EnvAgency.

Great stuff by @RachSalv https://t.co/d01T1Ts2Ft

Our Field Team has been cutting the grass on the #flood banks at Corbridge in #Northumberland - this allows us to maintain the defences and carry out inspections to ensure they are ready for winter. https://t.co/Ip1YSgsYh3
Happy to report that the brilliant volunteers of the Hereford Community Clean Up Group are now planning a clean up operation. https://t.co/W8j9StkoLC https://t.co/ntOuYEycPv

Within the Peak Flows Dataset Version 9 we've an added additional water year for all active peak flow stations in the UK, up to the end of September 2019. https://t.co/0bpMwvmT7d @EnvAgency @NatResWales @ScottishEPA @deptinfra https://t.co/NXuzuuzGYI

Take a look at some real-life examples of people who have used property flood resilience (#PFR) to adapt their properties to #flooding in @floodmary’s booklet here: https://t.co/ZgBiWrACgj

There are some great case studies in here!

#30Days30WaysUK @EnvAgencyNW @floodre https://t.co/uSvMd9PuVe

#6 Hard-engineered solutions alone cannot solve flooding. We also need natural solutions—and an exciting new approach is being trialled in the Wyre catchment with @WyreRiversTrust @unitedutilities @triodosuk @EnvAgency @coopukinsurance @floodre @WoodlandTrust 👏 #WorldRiversDay https://t.co/3iAc90reKF
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Sad isn't it?  A massive failure in leadership really. Great question - what is the EA definition of "enhance"?

The mayor has confirmed that places in temporary accommodation will not be ready in time for the September 2021 intake @MarvinJRees @BS5SecForum
https://t.co/grg6ze4d3L

urls.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19): disposing of waste
urls.description: How to dispose of your personal or business waste, including face coverings, personal protective equipment (PPE) and from lateral flow tests, during the coronavirus pandemic.

tweets.text:
This is devastating.

#PlasticPollution puts our wildlife and environment at risk.

Take simple action:

✅ Always bin disposable face coverings and gloves
♻️ Use reusable face coverings where you can

➡️ https://t.co/pc9WM3wHh4

#KeepItBinIt #RespectProtectEnjoy #coronavirus https://t.co/31PMEjEVPP

tweets.text: @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Just want to make sure I have this right.  They set the bar themselves really low (actually non existent as undefined - “enhance”).  And then they failed to get over the low bar they set themselves.  In any business, management would be fired or resign.

Apply at https://t.co/5CHO7Js4pq  @DefraGovUK @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency https://t.co/YJ4b7WPyLl
